content: S-BH (IMP) Impact bit holder High-performance bit holder with impact zone for use with impact screwdrivers ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- - ### FEATURES:Features The impact bit holder helps ensure above-average service life even under extreme conditions when used with impact screwdrivers The additional ring magnet holds longer and heavier screws securely Longer bit lifetime thanks to two coupled torsion zones that cushion impacts Long screws can be fastened without wobbling Applications Fits all 1/4 screwdriver bits in accordance with DIN 3126 C 6.3 and E 6.3 Recommended for use with impact screwdrivers and Hilti impact bits Ideal for overhead work as the floating ring magnet holds the screws in place ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 3 in Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039216 - Bit holder S-BH IMP 75/3 RM - Package Size 1 pc
tag_description: High-performance bit holder with impact zone for use with impact screwdrivers
